dao

Class CustomerDBDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • dao.CustomerDBDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CustomerDAO

    public class CustomerDBDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements CustomerDAO
    this class implements a Customer data access object to perform operations with objects and database Receives data from the database to the user || write data received from the user to the database
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    monder
